Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the role of Saudi terrorists in killing Americans on US soil compared to any other nation.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that Saudi terrorists have killed more Americans on US soil than any other nation.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that renting the 45th floor of Trump Tower and paying in cash is evidence of Saudi terrorists' involvement, which is a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided that the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, not Saudi terrorists, bought the 45th floor of Trump World Tower.
